person.persName: Pleasant M. Hale (Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Charles Hale and Margaret Hale. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850 and 1860. Household owned two enslaved persons in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District No. 2; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 60; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, District No. 2, p. 4; Find A Grave, "Pleasant Mayfield Hale (1827-1911)," Memorial #27570398, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=27570398 (accessed August 30, 2017).
